PrecisAppointment of PAUL CÔTÉ, currently the Chief Operating Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., to act in the stead of Marc LeFrançois, President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., during the period while the latter remains under suspension, effective immediately.
